Detailed Description

cvmx_sriomaint::_erb_attr_capt

This register contains the information captured during the error. The hardware will not update this register (i.e. this register is locked) while VALID is set in this CSR. The hardware sets SRIO_INT_REG[PHY_ERB] every time it sets VALID in this CSR. To handle the interrupt, the following procedure may be best:

(1) read this CSR, corresponding SRIOMAINT()_ERB_ERR_DET, SRIOMAINT()_ERB_PACK_SYM_CAPT, SRIOMAINT()_ERB_PACK_CAPT_1, SRIOMAINT()_ERB_PACK_CAPT_2, and SRIOMAINT()_ERB_PACK_CAPT_3. (2) Write VALID in this CSR to 0. (3) clear SRIO_INT_REG[PHY_ERB].
